recipesJson.name: Peach Yogurt MTL
recipesJson.author: DadaFry
recipesJson.description: A simple tastey peach yogurt I made for mouth to lung vaping with higher nicotine. Steep at least two weeks to let everything bind together.

reviews.text: This is great, been vaping in my kf lite for a solid 5 days now and my coil is still going strong and nice and clean. I wish I tasted the peach a bit more but that may be due to my own tastebuds and the notorious vapers tongue.
